mobiles.name: hollyphant
mobiles.long_description: A Hollyphant is delivering a message here.
mobiles.description:
It looks like a large, winged, furry elephant.  It emits an 
aura of goodness.

mobiles.name: planetar
mobiles.long_description: A planetar is here watching out for his master's interest.
mobiles.description:
Humanoid in appearance, the planetar has wings and is 
hairless.  He is on a mission from his deity.

mobiles.name: shedu
mobiles.long_description: A Shedu is here fighting evil.
mobiles.description:
Half man, half beast.  The Shedu is out looking for evil 
anywhere it may be and it will hunt down until death is the 
result.

mobiles.name: dretch demon
mobiles.long_description: A dretch is here slobbering on you.
mobiles.description:
A pathetic, slobbering thing.  The dretch is constantly 
picked on by its more powerful, demon brothers.

mobiles.name: chasme fly demon
mobiles.long_description: A chasme is flying around here.
mobiles.description:
The chasme or fly demon is half-human and half-fly.  They 
don't like anyone, not even other demons.

mobiles.name: babau ebony
mobiles.long_description: A babau is standing here looking for food.
mobiles.description:
The babau or one-horned horror is a demon of considerable 
fright.  He appears a skeleton with a black leather jumpsuit 
on.  He is constantly searching for flesh to eat.

mobiles.name: yagnodemon demon
mobiles.long_description: A yagnodemon is here flexing his giant-sized arm.
mobiles.description:
The yagnodemon has one man-sized and one giant-sized arm.  
With the giant-sized arm it can wield huge weapons.  He is 
not in a good mood right now.

mobiles.name: kostchtchie demon kost
mobiles.long_description: Kostchtchie is here resting on his journey of evil.
mobiles.description:
Kostchtchie a powerful demon lord is here.  Obviously 
derived from giant stock, he is very powerful.  And he does 
not like to be interrupted.

mobiles.name: nabassu demon
mobiles.long_description: A nabassu is here looking to upgrade his status.
mobiles.description:
A tall, thin demon, the nabassu are very bat-like in 
appearance.  He seems to have an intense interest in you.

mobiles.name: dragon cloud
mobiles.long_description: A cloud dragon is here wanting to be left alone.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is as large as a red dragon, but does not like 
to get involved in the struggle between good and evil.  It 
wants to be left alone.

mobiles.name: solar
mobiles.long_description: A solar is here contemplating the fight against evil.
mobiles.description:
A beautiful being, the solar is totally dedicated to the 
continuation of the good beings.

mobiles.name: wemic
mobiles.description:
Part man, part lion; the wemic is a creature 
not to be taken lightly.

mobiles.name: frost giant
mobiles.long_description: A frost giant is here looking for treasure.
mobiles.description:
Large members of the giant family, the frost giants are 
ravenous collectors of treasure.  They don't like to share 
this treasure with anyone.

mobiles.name: gorgimera
mobiles.long_description: A gorgimera is here flexing its wings.
mobiles.description:
This three-headed monster is waiting to rip the head off of 
its latest victim to add to its collection.  Watch out for 
that breath attack.

mobiles.name: ratatosk
mobiles.long_description: Ratatosk is here delivering the Gods' messages.
mobiles.description:
You see a giant squirrel carrying greetings and tidings from 
the various deities residing in these realms.  He does not 
want to be delayed in his task.

objects.name: hammer iron
objects.short_description: a huge hammer of cold iron
objects.description: A hammer of iron with silver and nickel detail lies here.

objects.name: bastard sword
objects.description: A beautiful sword lies on the ground here.

objects.name: cloudy staff
objects.description: A staff made of cloudy glass lies here.

objects.name: crystal sleeves
objects.short_description: a set of sleeves of crystal
objects.description: Some sleeves made of crystal lie here.

objects.name: sparkling green
objects.description: A green potion is lying here sparkling.

objects.name: paper triangle
objects.description: A piece of paper in the shape of a triangle is here.

objects.name: hollyphant tusk
objects.description: A tusk of a hollyphant lies here.

objects.name: girth cast iron
objects.description: A cast iron girth lies here.

rooms.name: The Entrance to Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
This is the entrance to Yggdrasil, the World Ash.  Through
this tree are conduits to many other planes of existence.

exits.description: You see the trunk rising up into the sky.

You see the trunk descending down into the depths of the
earth.

rooms.name: The Trunk of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are traveling in Yggdrasil, the World Ash.  Who knows
what other travelers you may encounter.

exits.description: The trunk continues to go up here.
The entrance to the tree is below.

rooms.name: The Lower Trunk of Yggrasil
rooms.description:
You are in the lower reaches of Yggdrasil.  The tree top 
cannot be seen.  Lesser astral travelers can be seen moving 
about.

exits.description: A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
The trunk continues up the tree.
The way down the tree is this way.

rooms.name: A Lower Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the lower level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: The Crest of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are on the top of the World Ash.  You can see in the 
distance many realms and dimensions.  This is definitely a 
crossroads to the gods.

exits.description: The way down the trunk of Yggdrasil lies this way.

rooms.name: A Lower Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the lower level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: A Lower Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the lower level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: The Roots of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are under the ground among the roots of Yggdrasil.  You 
sense a greater preponderance of evil in this area.  Your 
fellow travelers also tend to be of the evil persuasion.

exits.description: The roots lead off in this direction.
The roots lead off in this direction.
The roots lead off in this direction.
The roots lead off in this direction.
The entrance to the tree is in this direction.
The deepest part of the tree is down here.

rooms.name: The Roots of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are in the roots of the great tree.  Many odd creatures 
can be seen and felt wandering in the area.

exits.description: The roots continue in this direction.

rooms.name: The Roots of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are in the roots of the great tree.  Many odd creatures 
can be seen and felt wandering in the area.

exits.description: The roots continue in this direction.

rooms.name: The Roots of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are in the roots of the great tree.  Many odd creatures 
can be seen and felt wandering in the area.

exits.description: The roots continue in this direction.

rooms.name: A Lower Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the lower level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: The Deepest Roots of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are at the tree's deepest point.  Looking down from here 
you can almost see the foul and evil realms of the followers 
of evil.  You can faintly hear the screams of their tortured 
victims.

exits.description: You see the roots of the tree continue in this direction.

rooms.name: A Middle Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the middle level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: A Middle Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the middle level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: A Middle Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the middle level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: A Middle Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the middle level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: The Middle Trunk of Yggrasil
rooms.description:
You are in the middle parts of Yggdrasil.  The tree top 
still cannot be seen.  Many travelers are passing you in 
fulfillment of their quests.

exits.description: A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
The trunk continues towards the heavens.
The way down the tree is this way.

rooms.name: The Upper Trunk of Yggrasil
rooms.description:
You are in the topmost section of Yggdrasil.  The tree top 
is just above you.  Great power can be sensed in this area.  
There is also goodness here.

exits.description: A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
A limb branches off in this direction.
The top of the tree can be seen here.
The way down the tree is this way.

rooms.name: An Upper Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the upper level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: An Upper Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the upper level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: An Upper Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the upper level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: An Upper Branch of Yggdrasil
rooms.description: You are on a limb on the upper level of Yggdrasil.

exits.description: The main trunk is in this direction.

rooms.name: The Roots of Yggdrasil
rooms.description:
You are in the roots of the great tree.  Many odd creatures 
can be seen and felt wandering in the area.

exits.description: The roots continue in this direction.
